kpi_info.title: Computer peak load ratio
kpi_info.use:
The peak load rate in percentage (0...100).
This is the highest recorded value of the processor load during a measurement period. The peak load is an average load of 4 seconds.

This KPI is similar to msc_594a. New KPI ID reference (CDS NE). This new KPI ID reference is to to be used starting from M15.1 report sets.
